attributes.action: Urgently suspend all entry visa requirements for Ukrainian nationals fleeing war
attributes.additional_details: The war in Ukraine is escalating hour by hour. This is widely reported. Families fleeing conflict in Ukraine have no way to apply for visa via usual route (apply in their own country) so urgent action is needed now to suspend usual entry requirements.
attributes.background: Escalation of humanitarian crisis in Ukraine means that thousands of families are seeking refuge in neighbouring countries. While most of them will remain there, some will have good reasons to travel further, including to the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
